mapper.select:
select book_id as bookId, book_code as bookCode, book_name as bookName, author, publisher, publication_date as publicationDate, category from book_mst where 1 = 1
and (
book_name like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%') or author like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%') or publisher like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%') )
and category = #{category}
order by
book_name, author, publication_date, publication_date desc,
book_id
limit #{index}, #{count}
